nodes.bodyText: White or black, it is a question!😁
I'm not quite sure how many users are using this API. If we can provide another way to enable it (on their own risk), that can be more flexible.
Yes I aggree, it's better to enable or disable this API with kylin.properties configuration. I'm working on it.

Currently the function that setting config from the front end only can be enable or disable at the backend by modify the property  "kylin.web.set-config-enable" at kylin.properties and it's disable by default.
If "kylin.web.set-config-enable" is set to false, kylin will throw an exception when user try to  set config from website or restful API.
